message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, how about $11,000? This still leaves room for both of us to be satisfied. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible here, but I can't go lower than $10,800. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product for you. Let's try to find a middle ground.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,700 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go lower than $10,750. This is my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to move on to another buyer.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,650 for the product.
